alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jackson; Macon; Smith; Trousdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 01 at 1:21AM CDT until April 01 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN SMITH...JACKSON...WESTERN CLAY...SOUTHEASTERN MACON AND EAST CENTRAL TROUSDALE COUNTIES... At 121 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 9 miles southeast of Lafayette, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Celina, Gainesboro, Red Boiling Springs, Moss, Whitleyville, Dixon Springs and Pleasant Shade. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
